title: Quiz 1
question: Does bind attach the sockaddr given as the 2nd parameter to the socket descriptor given as the first parameter?(True/False)

title: Quiz 2
question: If the connect() function fails, it returns 0. True or False?

title: Quiz 3
question: Accept() is a nonblocking call. True or False?

title: Quiz 4
question: Both read() and write() are blocking calls. True or False ?
